mapper.select: select p.id,p.ClntMrk,p.AppCde, p.AppNme, p.CertfCls, p.CertfCde, p.ClntAddr, p.Email, p.Mobile, p.Country, p.ZipCde, p.CusRiskLvl, p.CustRiskRank from nvhlapplicantvo p where 1=1 and AppNme like CONCAT('%','${appNme}','%' ) and AppCde=#{AppCde} and ClntAddr like CONCAT('%','${clntAddr}','%' ) and CertfCde=#{certfCde} and createAccount =#{createAccount} group by appCde limit #{offset},#{pageSize}

select count(*) from (select id from nvhlapplicantvo p where 1=1 and AppNme like CONCAT('%','${appNme}','%' ) and AppCde=#{appCde} and ClntAddr like CONCAT('%','${clntAddr}','%' ) and CertfCde=#{certfCde} and createAccount =#{createAccount} group by appCde) a
select p.id, p.AppCde, p.AppNme, p.CertfCls, p.CertfCde, p.ClntAddr, p.Email, p.Mobile, p.Country from nvhlapplicantvo p where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.update: update nvhlapplicantvo set updatetime=now(),updateAccount=#{updateAccount} ,AppCde=#{appCde} ,AppNme=#{appNme} ,CertfCls=#{certfCls} ,CertfCde=#{certfCde} ,ClntAddr=#{clntAddr} ,Email=#{email} ,Mobile=#{mobile} ,Country=#{country} where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from nvhlapplicantvo where 1=1 and id=#{id} and AppNme=#{appNme} and CertfCde=#{certfCde} and AppCde=#{appCde}
